/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves forming a natural canopy overhead. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Traffic lights and street signs punctuate the scene, providing guidance for the city's inhabitants and visitors. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene, enhancing the colors and details of the buildings and trees.
